languages.text: "Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Не знал, что вы настолько ретивы в схватке с врагами Человечества! Недооценил! Исправлю пролитой ксенокровью!"

"I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"
languages.original_text: "Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Не знал, что вы настолько ретивы в схватке с врагами Человечества! Недооценил! Исправлю пролитой ксенокровью!"

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your Grace. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will make up for my mistake in spilled xenoblood!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your Grace. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will make up for my mistake in spilled xenoblood!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: “我很抱歉，大人，我不知道你如此热心地渴望打击人类之敌！是我低估了你的决心！我愿意杀死两倍于此的异形，以此来弥补我的错误！”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，大人，我不知道你如此热心地渴望打击人类之敌！是我低估了你的决心！我愿意杀死两倍于此的异形，以此来弥补我的错误！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。まさかここまで派手に人類の敵と戦うとは思いませんでした！あなたを甘く見ていました！あなたを侮った罪として、倍の量の異種族の血を流してみせます！」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。まさかここまで派手に人類の敵と戦うとは思いませんでした！あなたを甘く見ていました！あなたを侮った罪として、倍の量の異種族の血を流してみせます！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. ¡No sabía que sintiera tanto fervor por exterminar a los enemigos de la Humanidad! ¡L{mf|e|a} había subestimado! ¡Ahora derramaré el doble de sangre xenos para expiar mi error!».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. ¡No sabía que sintiera tanto fervor por exterminar a los enemigos de la Humanidad! ¡L{mf|e|a} había subestimado! ¡Ahora derramaré el doble de sangre xenos para expiar mi error!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. J'ignorais que vous étiez aussi {mf|impatient|impatiente} d'affronter les ennemis de l'humanité ! Je vous avais sous-{mf|estimé|estimée} ! Pour me faire pardonner mon erreur de jugement, je ferai couler deux fois plus de sang xénos ! »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. J'ignorais que vous étiez aussi {mf|impatient|impatiente} d'affronter les ennemis de l'humanité ! Je vous avais sous-{mf|estimé|estimée} ! Pour me faire pardonner mon erreur de jugement, je ferai couler deux fois plus de sang xénos ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wusste nichts von Eurem Eifer im Kampf gegen die Feinde der Menschheit! Ich habe Euch unterschätzt! Ich werde doppelt so viel Xenos-Blut vergießen, um meinen Fehler wiedergutzumachen!"
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wusste nichts von Eurem Eifer im Kampf gegen die Feinde der Menschheit! Ich habe Euch unterschätzt! Ich werde doppelt so viel Xenos-Blut vergießen, um meinen Fehler wiedergutzumachen!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: "Af buyurun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşta böyle hevesli olduğunuzu bilmiyordum! Sizi hafife almışım! Hatamı telafi etmek için iki katı zeno kanı dökeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I didn't know that you were so zealous in the fight against the enemies of Humanity! I underestimated you! I will spill twice as much xenos blood to atone for my mistake!"

traits.locale_text: "Üzgünüm {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnsanlığın Düşmanlarına karşı savaşta böyle hevesli olduğunuzu bilmiyordum! Sizi hafife almışım! Hatamı telafi etmek için iki katı zeno kanı dökeceğim!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake
